contribution_desc: Understanding the cost of display switching for multi-display configurations (i.e., gaze-switches between mobile device and large screen for map search, text search tasks, and photo search).
device_models: HTC Desire HD mobile device; LG High Definition Liquid Crystal display
evaluation: Quality measurements (e.g., accuracy of tracking); Subjective workload
crossdevice_def:
Not a cross-device definition, but an interesting statement:

"In this paper we provide empirical evidence of how different distribution of input/output across mobile and large display affects user performance, subjective workload and subjective preferences in a wide range of common mobile tasks"
